Text:
Uh, hey.  I know you got this pack from a Demonoid torrent called ESL Teacher's Vocabulary and Grammar Pack... or something like that... which I just about finished sorting through because there were so many duplicates inside...

Anyway, if you were gonna seed a new torrent, the least you could do is remove the dupes, edit the names or something... especially when you're begging for money...

Thank god for uTorrent which let me cut out your dupes...
